%mdk-data-line={98}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5dbc98dcc983a70728bd082d1a47546e]%mdk
$S$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={99}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[800618943025315f869e4e1f09471012]%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fc56270e7a70fa81a5935b72eacbe29]%mdk
$A$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={100}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b]%mdk
$1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d23a4ce8bca0f4891e037439a79b45a6]%mdk
$X,Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2e9ef3d6ef62a48d70720728d3e90e31]%mdk
$\Omega$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[440a1cbb2d8acdd9450537b59f5d613a]%mdk
$\Delta(X,Y)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[270cae4181b6e4ee32d2d4b7f6bb9835]%mdk
$\sum_{\omega\in\Omega}\left| \Pr[X=\omega]-\Pr[Y=\omega]\right|$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2e9ef3d6ef62a48d70720728d3e90e31]%mdk
$\Omega$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cf28c2daee299bfe0220b54acd2921ae]%mdk
$X^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b8daaa2fe9399304605e7c00547a05f0]%mdk
$\Omega^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cf28c2daee299bfe0220b54acd2921ae]%mdk
$X^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[098b7601b1905942fde63e961281711f]%mdk
$\Pr[ X^m = (\omega_1,\ldots,\omega_m)]=\Pr[X=\omega_1]\cdots\Pr[X=\omega_m]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[42900a93052a39b32b64124775d7a386]%mdk
$\Delta(X,T)<\delta$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={103}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[78a81256c91a428cea2bac67b73ccf88]%mdk
$\Delta(X^m,Y^m) \leq m\delta$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={105}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cf28c2daee299bfe0220b54acd2921ae]%mdk
$X^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={105}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1dba98149210a974d89fa3dff5b57b90]%mdk
$Y^m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={106}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[6f8f57715090da2632453988d9a1501b]%mdk
$m$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={106}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[0ab3a848cd182cbd684662027dace90c]%mdk
$\Delta(X^m,Y^m) < \delta$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={106}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[78a81256c91a428cea2bac67b73ccf88]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={109}
\Delta(X^m,Y^m) \leq m\delta
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={111}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[40aa2227f8ab9f9737e2ce467090bb9c]%mdk
$m=1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={112}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8dfac775c203bcc32a9517abdf787c41]%mdk
$m = i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={112}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[11c19633c6d7b85eec5efafdd655392d]%mdk
$i + 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={112}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c90372cb11117b4e270cec028b704bcb]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={114}
\begin{aligned}
\Delta(X^{i+1},Y^{i+1}) &= \sum_{(w_1,\cdots,w_{i+1}) \in \Omega^{i+1}} |\Pr[X^{i+1} = (w_1,\cdots,w_{i+1})] - \Pr[Y^{i+1} = (w_1,\cdots,w_{i+1})]| \\
&=  \sum_{(w_1,\cdots,w_{i+1}) \in \Omega^{i+1}} |\Pr[X = w_1]\cdots \Pr[X = w_{i+1}] - \Pr[Y =w_1]\cdots \Pr[Y = w_{i+1}]| \\
&\leq  \sum_{w_{i+1} \in \Omega} |\Pr[X = w_{i+1}] - \Pr[Y = w_{i+1}|  \\
&+\sum_{(w_1,\cdots,w_{i}) \in \Omega^{i}} |\Pr[X = w_1]\cdots \Pr[X = w_{i}] - \Pr[Y =w_1]\cdots \Pr[Y = w_{i}]| \\
&= \sum_{w_{i+1} \in \Omega} |\Pr[X_{i+1} = w_{i+1}] - \Pr[Y_{i+1} = w_{i+1}| \\
&+ \sum_{(w_1,\cdots,w_{i}) \in \Omega^{i}} |\Pr[X^{i} = ((w_1,\cdots,w_{i}))] - \Pr[Y^{i} = ((w_1,\cdots,w_{i}))]|\\
&\leq \delta + i\delta \\
&= (i+1)\delta
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8d9b48bf6d673faf8f47cc1a04fd8f79]%mdk
$p>5$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c81e728d9d4c2f636f067f89cc14862c]%mdk
$2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[d0adf97f397238edda34593086a75c45]%mdk
$S(x) = s_0 + s_1x+ s_2x^2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[83878c91171338902e0fe0fb97a8c47a]%mdk
$p$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c65712597115c467045251bdfa95e82c]%mdk
$s_0,s_1,s_2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1d845fd5c95058f0c19a8af900c11e16]%mdk
$\Z_p$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={133}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5f007ba4b07a4bb205615fed8a783650]%mdk
$(S(1),S(2),S(3),S(4),S(5)) \in \Z_p^5$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={135}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[41f5bb3ed5f30daa227f789d61fb146f]%mdk
$i,j,k \in \{1,\ldots, 5 \}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={135}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fdd73773220619e0e13d891d2dde6a4]%mdk
$S(0)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={135}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[45d3313779193d49b61fe9687c945348]%mdk
$S(i),S(j),S(k)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={137}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d8ed3ad9f5f4e62238861278e76932d0]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={141}
\begin{pmatrix} 
1 & i & i^2 \\
1 & j & j^2 \\
1 & k & k^2 
\end{pmatrix}
\begin{pmatrix}
s_0 \\ s_1 \\ s_2
\end{pmatrix}
=
\begin{pmatrix}
S(i)\\S(j)\\ S(k)
\end{pmatrix} \pmod{p}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={155}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f7820e082e23e31bc5a25c5e7b5a1c43]%mdk
$s_0,s_1,s_1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={155}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a9175ac52b5153759f2c3680d6dde71d]%mdk
$S(0) = s_0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={157}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e2f0579d844f263cf2027a9cbadd6466]%mdk
$i \neq j \neq k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={159}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1a09e233aba9a900bccdac0adce412c1]%mdk
$c_0,c_1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={159}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d646abb94b0ffef6e1e54de013c112e4]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={162}
\begin{aligned}
c_0 + c_1 i &= i^2 \pmod{p} \\
c_0 + c_1 j &= j^2 \pmod{p} \\
c_0 + c_1 k &= k^2 \pmod{p} \\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={168}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[85f8524e2980c0cd498647470d5ffd8f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={170}
\begin{aligned}
c_1 (i-j) &= i^2 - j^2 = (i-j)(i+j) \pmod{p}\\
c_1 (i-k) &= i^2 - k^2 = (i-k)(i+k)\pmod{p}\\
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={175}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[24b2785cc102a28afad9b6b394eeaa5f]%mdk
$i \neq j \pmod p$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={175}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b073924ff62e06c3596742ee601da13f]%mdk
$i \neq k \pmod p$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={176}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[19c879add6af377394c7b455ff5a2025]%mdk
$(i-j)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={176}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7d2d0445faaaece6bc70b144cf19cd03]%mdk
$(i-k)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={176}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3f6da943e2fe15872b25541e32857a99]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={178}
\begin{aligned}
c_1 &= (i+j) \pmod{p}\\
c_1 &= (i+k) \pmod{p}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={183}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[15447f197ddb43630702a2c984f341f5]%mdk
$0 = i+j = i + k  \pmod{p} \implies j = k \pmod{p}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={184}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[20d172080f660ac3d58312127d2d6a3f]%mdk
$i,j,k$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={184}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1a09e233aba9a900bccdac0adce412c1]%mdk
$c_0,c_1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={184}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[359d1939d012452893a1d40e473fc667]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={188}
\begin{pmatrix}
s_0 \\ s_1 \\ s_2
\end{pmatrix} = \begin{pmatrix} 
1 & i & i^2 \\
1 & j & j^2 \\
1 & k & k^2 
\end{pmatrix}^{-1}
\begin{pmatrix}
S(i)\\S(j)\\ S(k)
\end{pmatrix} \pmod{p}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={199}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7fdd73773220619e0e13d891d2dde6a4]%mdk
